example_en: I have something to tell you.

example_ch: 足球是我最喜歡的運動。

example_en: I can swim in the pool.
example_ch: 我可以在游泳池裡游泳。

example_en: They want to win the game.

example_ch: 棒球是美國的國民運動。

example_en: Golf is played on a course.
We went hiking in the mountains.
Ice skating is fun in winter.
Dance is both art and sport.
example_ch: 跳舞既是藝術也是運動。

example_en: Track events include running and jumping.
The stadium was full of fans.
I'm a big fan of this team.

example_ch: 我們需要新的運動裝備.
自行車選手戴頭盔安全。

example_en: She goes to the fitness center.
Sports require a lot of energy.
The cheetah is known for its speed.
Defense is as important as offense.
Pass the ball to your teammate.
Throw the ball to first base.
He can kick the ball far.
Hit the ball with the bat.
Basketball players need to dribble well.
example_ch: 籃球選手需要很好的運球。

example_en: The pitcher threw a curve ball.
Take your position on the field.
The ball went through the ring.
Don't hit the ball into the net.
The referee made a fair call.
example_ch: 裁判做出了公正的判決。

example_en: He is a role model for kids.
Michael Jordan is a basketball legend.
He started as an amateur player.
His dream is to win the Olympics.
